item.description:
My friend Steven and I are seeing Watchmen Sun 3/8 at the AMC theater at the Dartmouth Mall. The show is at 1:40 and costs $4.50. RSVP or just show up and meet us in the lobby. I think we'll go into the theater about 15 min prior to show time. Afterwards we'll discuss the comparisons between the movie and the graphic novel at Panera or somewhere else nearby.

The mall is located off exit 12 off of 195 (Faunce Corner Mall Road exit).

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me in the lobby

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Last-minute movie: Watchmen
